name: Chicken Curry
description: Creamy, aromatic Indian-inspired chicken curry with rich spices and coconut milk.

instructions.instruction: Marinate chicken cubes with half the curry powder, half salt, and turmeric.
Heat oil in large deep skillet over medium-high heat.
Add marinated chicken, brown on all sides 3-4 minutes, remove.
instructions.tip: Doesn't need to cook through, just get color.

instructions.instruction: Add onions to same pan, cook 5-6 minutes until caramelized.
Add garlic and ginger, cook 1 minute until fragrant.
Add remaining curry powder, garam masala, cumin, and cayenne. Stir 30 seconds.
Add crushed tomatoes, stir and cook 3 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk, bring to simmer.
Reduce heat, return browned chicken to pan.
Simmer partially covered 15 minutes until chicken is cooked and sauce thickens.
Taste and adjust salt if needed.
Place basmati rice on serving plates.
Spoon curry beside or over rice, garnish with fresh cilantro and serve.

tips: Can substitute yogurt or cream for coconut milk.
Increase green chilies or cayenne for more heat.
Tastes even better made a day ahead - flavors meld.
storageInfo: Refrigerate 4 days, freeze up to 2 months.
servingSuggestion: Serve with basmati rice, naan bread, and cucumber raita.
variations: Vegetarian chickpea: Use chickpeas instead of chicken.
With spinach: Add spinach last 5 minutes.
Shrimp: Use shrimp instead, reduce cooking time.
